Welcome to DartCMS documentation!¶

DartCMS is an open-source content management system based on the popular Django Framework. It’s friendly for developers and end-users.

Features¶

Tree-like website page structure Fast and easy CMS module developing Fully customizable admin interface color scheme (LESS sources are provided) Multi-language support (currently only 2 languages - Russian (main) and English) Built with Twitter Bootstrap 3 TinyMCE as rich editor Custom filemanager to work with TinyMCE

Modules¶

At the moment, these modules are included:

  • Site Structure
  • CMS Users
  • Site Settings
  • News and Articles
  • Advertising (ads, ad places and ad sections)
  • Feedback and FAQ
  • E-shop. With product categories, sections etc

Installation¶

You can install DartCMS with pip:

pip install dartcms
